longdescription: The Silverlit 84634 Apple Bluetooth Sky Heli has two gesture controls, the full and partial gesture. Full gesture control allows you to move and fly the heli by just tilting your iPhone or iPad. Raising your iPhone/iPad lifts the heli up in the air, moving the controller forward makes the heli fly forward, and bringing it back moves the heli backward. Tilting the iPhone/iPad left or right turns the heli left or right. Partial gesture lets you use a virtual joystick where you need to tap or touch the on screen buttons to control the heli. You can see the heli\'s control panel on your iPhone/iPad, heal the rotors of the engine, and feel the vibration during the flight.
productname: Silverlit 84634 Apple Bluetooth Sky Heli
